title: Kefaret
overview: Five years ago, music teacher Zeynep moved with her two young children and her doctor husband Ahmet to their beautiful home in their newly appointed town, and was sure that their future would be as perfect as that summer morning. She wished a wish on her birthday. But in the subsequent five years that followed, she lost everything. Commissioner Sinan never left Zeynep's side, and as a result of his great love for her, he lost his job. Zeynep tried one last way to get back what she lost, and hand-in-hand with Sinan, they stubbornly took back everything she lost, one after one.
